componentList.name: LyDrawer

typeAliasList.name: LyDrawerMode
typeAliasList.children: type LyDrawerMode = 'side' | 'over'

typeAliasList.name: LyDrawerPosition
typeAliasList.children: type LyDrawerPosition = Placement

variableList.name: DEFAULT_MODE
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_MODE = "side"

variableList.name: DEFAULT_POSITION
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_POSITION = XPosition.before

variableList.name: DEFAULT_VALUE
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_VALUE = ""

variableList.name: DEFAULT_WIDTH
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_WIDTH = "230px"

variableList.name: STYLE_PRIORITY
variableList.children: const STYLE_PRIORITY = -2

ngModuleList.name: LyDrawerModule
ngModuleList.children: import { LyDrawerModule } from '@alyle/ui/drawer'
